verses.verse: וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- shall be when יָבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u are come עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim And it shall come to pass when all these things הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, of these הַבְּרָכָה֙ <S%H1293><s%> hab-be-ra-Chah upon thee the blessing וְהַקְּלָלָ֔ה <S%H7045><s%> ve-hak-ke-la-Lah, and the curse אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti which I have set לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha; before וַהֲשֵׁבֹתָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-she-vo-Ta thee and thou shalt call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Ve-cha, [them] to mind בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, among all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הִדִּיחֲךָ֛ <S%H5080><s%> hid-di-cha-Cha hath driven יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. and you

וְשַׁבְתָּ֞ <S%H7725><s%> ve-shav-Ta And shalt return עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֣ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-ma'-Ta and shalt obey בְקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> ve-ko-Lo, his voice כְּכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha according to all that I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; thee this day אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha, thou and thy children בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol to all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. and with all thy soul

וְשָׁ֨ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav will turn יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh That then the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁבוּתְךָ֖ <S%H7622><s%> she-vu-te-Cha thy captivity וְרִחֲמֶ֑ךָ <S%H7355><s%> ve-ri-cha-Me-cha; and have compassion וְשָׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shav, upon thee and will return וְקִבֶּצְךָ֙ <S%H6908><s%> ve-kib-betz-Cha and gather מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, thee from all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הֱפִֽיצְךָ֛ <S%H6327><s%> he-fi-tze-Cha hath scattered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. in it

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become נִֽדַּחֲךָ֖ <S%H5080><s%> nid-da-cha-Cha If [any] of thine be driven out בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh unto the outmost הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; [parts] of heaven מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there יְקַבֶּצְךָ֙ <S%H6908><s%> ye-kab-betz-Cha gather יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from thence will the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> u-mish-Sham there יִקָּחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-ka-Che-cha. thee and from thence will he fetch

וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֞ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-vi-'a-Cha will bring יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יָרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H3423><s%> ya-re-Shu possessed אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha which thy fathers וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> vi-rish-Tah; and thou shalt possess וְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֥ <S%H3190><s%> ve-hei-tiv-Cha it and he will do thee good וְהִרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-be-Cha and multiply מֵאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> me-'a-vo-Tei-cha. thee above thy fathers

וּמָ֨ל <S%H4135><s%> u-Mal will circumcise יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha thine heart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav and the heart זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha; of thy seed לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֥ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Cha and with all thy soul לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha. that thou mayest live

וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan will put יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָל֖וֹת <S%H423><s%> ha-'a-Lot all these curses הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon אֹיְבֶ֥יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha upon thine enemies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and שֹׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ei-cha and on them that hate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who רְדָפֽוּךָ׃ <S%H7291><s%> re-da-Fu-cha. thee which persecuted

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you תָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv, And thou shalt return וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֖ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-ma'-Ta and obey בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav, all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. thee this day

וְהוֹתִֽירְךָ֩ <S%H3498><s%> ve-ho-ti-re-Cha will make thee plenteous יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh in every work יָדֶ֗ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha, of thine hand בִּפְרִ֨י <S%H6529><s%> bif-Ri in the fruit בִטְנְךָ֜ <S%H990><s%> vit-ne-Cha of thy body וּבִפְרִ֧י <S%H6529><s%> u-vif-Ri and in the fruit בְהֶמְתְּךָ֛ <S%H929><s%> ve-hem-te-Cha of thy cattle וּבִפְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> u-vif-Ri and in the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H127><s%> 'ad-ma-te-Cha of thy land לְטוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> le-to-Vah; for good כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv will again יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD לָשׂ֤וּשׂ <S%H7797><s%> la-Sus rejoice עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha over לְט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> le-Tov, over thee for good כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- he שָׂ֖שׂ <S%H7797><s%> sas as he rejoiced עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha. over thy fathers

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki if תִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma', If thou shalt hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> be-kOl unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor to keep מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> ve-chuk-ko-Tav, and his statutes הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <S%H3789><s%> hak-ke-tu-Vah which are written בְּסֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> be-Se-fer in this book הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of the law הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki if תָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shuv [and] if thou turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. and with all thy soul פ Peh

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah For this commandment הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; thee this day לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor נִפְלֵ֥את <S%H6381><s%> nif-Let it [is] not hidden הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi he מִמְּךָ֔ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha, too וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor רְחֹקָ֖ה <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kah from thee neither [is] it far off הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> vash-sha-Ma-yim It [is] not in heaven הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-leh- Who shall go up לָּ֤נוּ La-nu הַשָּׁמַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-May-mah for us to heaven וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <S%H3947><s%> ve-yik-ka-Che-ha and bring לָּ֔נוּ La-nu, וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-yash-mi-'E-nu it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ve-na-'a-Sen-nah. it and do

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver Neither [is] it beyond לַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> lai-Yam the sea הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-vor- Who shall go לָ֜נוּ La-nu אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver over הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam the sea וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <S%H3947><s%> ve-yik-ka-Che-ha for us and bring לָּ֔נוּ La-nu, וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-yash-mi-'E-nu it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ve-na-'a-Sen-nah. it and do

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov nigh אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha But הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var But the word מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; [is] very בְּפִ֥יךָ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi-cha unto thee in thy mouth וּבִֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> u-vil-va-ve-Cha and in thy heart לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-so-To. that thou mayest do ס sa-Mek
